body: Type II - P and type II - L supernova are distinguished by differences in which of the following?

Name all of the following minerals which do NOT have a streak, given that a ceramic plate has a hardness of 6.9 on Moh's hardness scale: 1) Ruby 2) Aquamarine 3) Apatite
Name all of the following 3 which can be considered to be greasy: 1) Talc 2) Gypsum 3) Opal

A certain bag contains 3 red balls and 2 blue balls. Another bag contains 7 blue balls and 4 red balls. If 3 balls are picked out of each bag, what is the probability that no red balls are chosen?
Find the inverse of the 3 by 3 matrix with top row 3, 2, 1, middle row 4, 2, 3 and bottom row 1, 2, 0
answer: top row 1, - 1/3, - 2/3, middle row - 1/2, 1/6, 1/6, and bottom row - 1, 2/3, 1/3

body: Which of the following
If winston churchill likes to make speeches at 1000000 KHZ, and his microphone dies, which of the following frequencies should he talk at to make money

A sample of propane is burned inside a sealed elastic box with an oxygenated atmosphere. Which of the following 3 changes will cause the production of more reactants? 1. Doubling the volume 2. Increasing the temperature 3. Adding more propane
Which of the following 4 cesium halides has the crystal structure with the lowest coordination number?

11 people made DOE science bowl at a Oak Ridge High School. They had 3 Daniels, and are indistinguishable from one another, but all of the rest are distinguishable. How many ways are there to choose an A and B team if order does not matter and no more than 1 Daniel can be on each team? Assume that each team has 5 people.
Give the inverse of the 2x2 matrix with the top row being -4, 3 and the bottom row being 13, 3.
answer: The 2x2 matrix with top row -1/17, 1/17 and bottom row of 13/51 and 4/51

body: What is the name for a fast moving band of thunderstorms which most commonly forms in the midwest, and often forms tornadoes?

Daniel rides around town, blaring a constant note with a frequency of 432 Hz. He (illegally) drives towards Gideon, who is standing still, at 30 m/s. Given that the speed of sound is $300\athrm{m / s}$, what is the frequency which Gideon perceives, rounded to the nearest integer?

In terms of the gas constant R and the temperature T, what is the speed of the center of mass of the system after the collision?

When the hydrogen ion concentration is increased 10 fold, what is the new cell potential of the battery, assuming all other conditions remain constant?

The angular momentum of a round hollow ball with a mass and radius of 1 kilogram and 6 meters, respectively, is $\athrm{L} = \athrm{t}^{4} + 3\athrm{t}^{3} + 6\athrm{t}^{2} + 10\athrm{t} + 15$, where t is time. What is the angular velocity over the time interval from initial $\athrm{t} = 0$ to $\athrm{t} = 5$ seconds, in radians per second?
